Html:
Hi,

is it possible to localize the addin in a simple way? Otherwise, I would be happy to help adding a German version.

Best wishes
Michael

Yes, definitely - the project is set up such that every string is in a resource file, so updating those should be all you need to do. I've never done localization in VS before, but if you have, it should just work. :)

I uploaded the German resx files under Source Code :: Patches. Feel free to use them, with pleasure....

Best wishes
Michael
